import { Add, Remove } from '@material-ui/icons' import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './Cart.css' import { useStateValue } from './StateProvider'; export default function Cart() { const [ {cart}, dispatch] = useStateValue(); console.log("Cart Products: ", cart) const increaseQty = (e) => { console.log(e.target.parentNode.parentNode.parentNode.parentNode) } const decreaseQty = (e) => { } return (
{ cart?.length ? <> <> { cart.map( product => (

{product.product_name}

Quantity

{product.quantity}

Ksh. {product.product_price}

)) }
: <>

Empty Cart ;(

}
) }
